title: BSR Install for Vista
description:
This is the BSR install for Vista. Easy Install.

Straight from bsr.com

BSR Screen Recorder captures anything you see on the screen as video (with audio) and pictures. Records video as AVI, SWF and WMV. Full desktop, a window, a user specified region or autopan modes can be selected. WatchIt mode provides auto-capture of Internet video stream and Web cam recording.
